title: RANKED BUG SPLAT
body: I go ranked and as I am loading into game i get bug splat, then i cant connect to the game and i choose to reload the game, but when i get online they have already remade and i get that score on my score for ranked, cause i have not done my placements, so now i will never get to where i want to be cause this has hapend twice now.

replies.body: Bugsplats while loading the game can happen from bad drivers or game files.  Go through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help fix that up.  If this isn't a common occurrence then I think you'll be fine.  If for some reason you get to an unwanted placement, that's okay!  Just keep playing and climbing to your goal.  Good luck!

riot please 
remake my placements cause bugsplat ruined my placements
